# DetectHumanHandPoseRequest

**Structure**

A request that detects a human hand pose.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DetectHumanHandPoseRequest
```

## Overview

This type of request produces a collection of [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/HumanHandPoseObservation] objects that describe the hand pose.

## Creating a request

- **init(_:)**: Creates a human hand pose detection request.

## Getting the revision

- **revision**: The algorithm or implementation the request uses.
- **supportedRevisions**: The collection of revisions the request supports.
- **DetectHumanHandPoseRequest.Revision**: A type that describes the algorithm or implementation that the request performs.

## Inspecting a request

- **maximumHandCount**: The maximum number of hands to detect in an image.
- **supportedJointNames**: The joint names the request supports.
- **supportedJointsGroupNames**: The joint group names the request supports.

## Performing a request

- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on an image URL and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on image data and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Graphics image and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a pixel buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Media buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Image image and produces observations.
- **HumanHandPoseObservation**: An observation that provides the hand points the analysis recognizes.

## Body and hand pose detection

- **DetectHumanBodyPoseRequest**: A request that detects a human body pose.
- **PoseProviding**: An observation that provides a collection of joints that make up a pose.
- **Chirality**: The hand sidedness of a pose.
- **Joint**: A pose joint represented as a normalized point in an image, along with a label and a confidence value.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- ImageProcessingRequest
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- VisionRequest
